amendment.description: Amendment prohibits reducing the alert posture of the ICBM force.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 35 printed in House Report 114-112 to prohibit reducing the alert posture of the ICBM force.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lummis amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lummis amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mrs. Lummis.
